DOC.brief_summary: After a successful peripheral nerve block, blockade of sympathetic nerve fibers results in local vasodilatation, increased local blood flow, and increased skin temperature.Increased permeability index; Can be used as a reliable tool for evaluating block activity.
DOC.brief_title: Perfusion Index in the Success of Peripheral Nerve Block
